amendment.description: Amendment provides for an annual audit of the Federal Reserve.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 114-341 to provide for an annual audit of the Federal Reserve.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Grayson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
